ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(Text(Currency_Used__c)="Co-op $",Text(Currency_Used__c)="Premium Co-op $"),Text(Transaction_Type__c)="Credit", OR(Account_ID__r.Present_Tier_Formula__c="1",ISBLANK(Account_ID__r.Present_Tier_Formula__c)), AND(Text(Transaction_Sources__c)!="Co-Op Reimbursement", Text(Transaction_Sources__c)!="Expired Funds",Text(Transaction_Sources__c)!="Rebate Invoices reward",Text(Transaction_Sources__c)!="Loyalty Admin"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Accounts with either Tier 1 or No Tier is not applicable for COOP funds
